https://tmrev.io/movie/457837-Brotherhood of Blades II: The Infernal Battlefield 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bQ2fdFCcmCSDuI62JU9pVNTN7c4.jpg An imperial guard searches for the truth behind a conspiracy that framed him and his partners. The proof of his innocence lies with a wanted woman named Bei Zhai... but will she reveal what she knows? In this intense prequel to BROTHERHOOD OF BLADES, the only thing he can truly trust is his sword. Brotherhood of Blades II: The Infernal Battlefield
